synopsis.text: The phantom thief Kaitou Kid sets his sights on stealing a valuable jewel located on an isolated island hotel. To pull off the heist, he utilizes a remote-controlled lighthouse beam to aid his escape. However, high school detective Shinichi Kud≈ç, going by the alias Conan Edogawa after being turned into a child, stands in his way alongside Ran Mouri, Sonoko Suzuki, and the young Detective Boys. Together, they attempt to stop Kaitou Kid's jewel heist and protect both the jewel and hotel guests from harm. Though Kid proves a slippery foe, Conan and his friends remain determined to outwit the thief and bring him to justice. Their confrontation unfolds on the remote island, culminating in a battle of wits between Kid's criminal cunning and the detectives' skills.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
